SA15bsa071_u:2_0: (1.1) parokṣārthapratipatteranumānāśrayatvādeva tad vyutpādanārtha saṃkṣepata idamārabhyate- pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetustridhaiva saḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:3_0: (1.2) pakṣo dharmī, avayave samudāyopacārāt / prayojanābhāvādanupacāra iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:3_3: dharmavacanenāpi parāśrayatvād dharmasya dharmyāśrayasiddhau pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmiṇa eva siddhiriti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:3_5: siddhe tadaṃśavyāptyā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve punardharmiṇo vacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥ sa heturiti niyamārthamāśaṃkyeta /
SA15bsa071_u:3_6: dṛṣṭaṃ sajātīya eva sattvam ityavadhāraṇena sādhyābhāve siddhe 'pi vyatireke sādhyābhāve asattvavacanam,
SA15bsa071_u:3_7: tathehāpi tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt siddhe 'pi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve tatraiva bhāvaniyamārtha dharmivacanamāśaṃkyeta /
SA15bsa071_u:3_8: tasmāt sāmarthyād arthapratītāvapi upacāramātrāt samānanirdeśāt pratipattigauravaṃ ca parihṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:5_0: (1.4) tasya vyāptirhi vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva /
SA15bsa071_u:5_2: etena anvayo vyatireko vā pakṣadharmaśca yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena niścita uktaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:6_0: (1.5) tatra pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi pratyakṣato 'numānato vā prasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:7_0: sadhūmaṃ hi pradeśamarthāntaraviviktarūpamasādhāraṇātmanā dṛṣṭavataḥ smārtaṃ yathādṛṣṭabheda viṣayaṃ liṅgajñānamutpadyate /
SA15bsa071_u:9_0: (1.6) tasmiṃstathābhūte darśanena dṛṣṭesati sa yena yenāsādhāraṇastadasādhāraṇatāṃ tato bhedamabhilapantī atadvayāvṛtiviṣayā smṛtirutpatrā pratyakṣabalena na pramāṇam /
SA15bsa071_u:9_1: yathādṛṣṭākāragrahaṇāt, prāgasādhāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā asādhāraṇa ityabhilapataḥ apūrvārthādhigamābhāvāt,
SA15bsa071_u:10_0: arthakriyārthī hi sarvaḥ prekṣāvān pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vānveṣate /
SA15bsa071_u:10_1: na ca sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇapratipatterūrdhvaṃ tatsāmarthyotpatravikalpavijñānagrāhyaṃ kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayati /
SA15bsa071_u:10_5: na ca tatsvalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyārthakriyā kriyate /
SA15bsa071_u:11_0: (1.7) tasmāt anadhigatārthaviṣayaṃ pramāṇam ityapi anadhigate svalakṣaṇe iti viśeṣaṇīyam /
SA15bsa071_u:11_1: adhigate tu svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpastadanukārī kāryatastadviṣayatvāt smṛtireva,
SA15bsa071_u:11_6: tato 'pi vikalpāt vastunyeva tadadhyavasāyena puruṣasya pravṛtteḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:12_2: sādhāraṇe hi kārye na teṣāṃ sāmarthyabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:13_2: yathā sat tat kṣaṇikameva, akṣaṇikatve 'rthakriyā virodhāt tallakṣaṇaṃ vastutvaṃ hīyate /
SA15bsa071_u:14_2: satsu apyanyeṣu hetuṣu asyābhāve na bhavatīti yastadbhāve bhāvastadabhāve 'bhāvaśca pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tasya siddhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:14_3: kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hyarthāntarasya evaṃ syāt- yatra dhūmastatrāvaśyamagniriti,
SA15bsa071_u:14_4: agnibhāva eva hi bhāvo dhūmasya tatkāryatvamiti /
SA15bsa071_u:16_2: anuddiṣṭaviṣayaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvakhyāpanaṃ pratibandhamātrasiddhau sidhyatīti na tatra vyatirekasādhane anupalabdhyoḥ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇamapekṣyate /
SA15bsa071_u:17_3: agnimati pradeśe dhūma iti / abhāve ca upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiriti /
SA15bsa071_u:18_1: aparāparavyāvṛttibhedena dharmabhede satyapi vastutaḥ liṅgasvabhāva eva /
SA15bsa071_u:18_2: hetusvabhāve sādhyadharme 'nvayavyabhicārābhāvāt lakṣaṇe tanmātrānvayeneti viśeṣaṇaṃ paramatāpekṣam /
SA15bsa071_u:19_1: tena ca viśeṣaṇena tathavidhasya atatsvabhāvatāṃ tasmin sādhye hetorvyabhicāraṃ cāha /
SA15bsa071_u:20_1: yathā yat sat tat sarvaṃ kṣaṇikam /
SA15bsa071_u:20_2: yathā ghaṭādayaḥ / saṃśca śabdaḥ iti / tathā, kṣaṇikatvābhāve sattvābhāvaḥ saṃśca śabda iti /
SA15bsa071_u:21_0: (2.3) atra pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrasāmarthyādeva pratijñārthasya pratīteḥ na pratijñāyāḥ prayoga upadarśitaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:21_2: svayaṃ pratipattau prameyasya ka upadarśayitā? pradeśasthaṃ dhūmamupalabdhavataḥ tasyāgninā vyāpteḥ smaraṇe tatsāmarthyādeva agniratra iti pratijñārthapratītirbhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:21_3: na ca tatra kaścit agniratreti asmai nivedayati /
SA15bsa071_u:21_5: pramāṇamantareṇaivaṃ pratīteḥ nimittābhāvāt pratītau liṅgasya vaiyarthyam /
SA15bsa071_u:21_6: svayamevākasmāt agniratreti vyavasthāpya tatpratipattaye paścālliṅgamanusaratīti ko 'yaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ? pareṇāpi taducyamānaṃ plavata eva upayogābhāvāt /
SA15bsa071_u:21_8: tenaiva tāvaddarśyamānena ko 'rthaḥ? yadi pratītiranyathā na syāttadā sarvaṃ śobheta /
SA15bsa071_u:21_9: tasmādeṣa svayaṃpratītau kenacid viṣayopasthāpakena vināpi pratiyan asmān kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā parvabrāhmaṇa iva vyaktaṃ mūlyaṃ mṛgayate /
SA15bsa071_u:21_10_0: asmadvacanādapi svayaṃ siddhameva liṅgamanusṛtya sādhyaṃ pratyetīti ko 'nayoravasthayorviśeṣaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:21_11_0: tatra svayaṃ prameyopadarśanena vināpi pratipadya paraṃ pratipādayatrapūrva kramamāśrayate
SA15bsa071_u:21_11_1: iti kimatra kāraṇam? tasmātra prameyasya vacanena kiñcitprayojanamanyathāpi pratipatterutpatteḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:22_2: ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajyākṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kimiyatā pratītiḥ syātra veti /
SA15bsa071_u:22_3: bhāve kiṃ prapañcamālayā? iti iyāneva sādhanavākye prayogo jyāyān /
SA15bsa071_u:23_0: (2.5) atra pūrvaṃ hetuḥ prayoktavyaḥ paścād dṛṣṭānta iti kramaniyamo 'pi na kaścit /
SA15bsa071_u:24_2: nahi atatsvabhāvasya bhāve ekāntenānyasya bhāvaḥ kṛtakatvasya bhāve prayatnānantarīyakatvavat /
SA15bsa071_u:25_0: tasmādanvayavyatirekayoryathālakṣaṇameko 'pi prayokto dvitīyamākṣipatīti naikatraṃ sādhanavākye dvayoḥ prayogaḥ iṣyate vaiyarthyāt /
SA15bsa071_u:25_3: tadabhāva eva hetorabhāvakhyātiryathā syāt nānyatra vipakṣe viruddhe vā iti niyamakhyāpanārtho 'pi vyatirekaprayogo na yuktaḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:26_0: (2.7) kathamidam avagamyate sadavaśyaṃ naśvarasvabhāvamiti yena anvayavyatirekasambhava iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:26_1: vināśahetvayogāt / svabhāvata eva bhāvā naśvarāḥ naiṣāṃ svahetubhyo niṣpatrānāmanyato vināśotpattiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:26_2: tasyāsāmarthyāt / na hi vināśaheturbhāvasya svabhāvameva karoti tasya svahetubhyo nirvṛtteḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:26_3: nāpi bhāvāntarameva, bhāvāntarakaraṇe bhāvasya tadavasthatvāt tathopalabdhyādiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:26_7: bhāvapratiṣedhakaraṇe na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalamiti /
SA15bsa071_u:26_8: evaṃ ca kartā na bhavatītyakarturahetutvamiti na vināśahetuḥ kaścit /
SA15bsa071_u:27_0: (2.8) vaiyarthyācca / yadi svabhāvato naśvaraḥ svātmanyanavasthāyī bhāvaḥ tasya na kiñcinnāśakāraṇaiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:27_2: yo hi yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetoreva utpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati,
SA15bsa071_u:27_5: na hi prakāśādayastadātmāna utpannāḥ punaḥ prakāśādibhāve hetvantaramapekṣante /
SA15bsa071_u:27_7: tadvadasthitidharmā cet svabhāvato bhāvo niṣpanno na punastadātmatāyāṃ hetvantaramapekṣate /
SA15bsa071_u:28_6: bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt tatsvabhāvasya paścādiva prāgāpi jananaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa071_u:29_1: pūrvabhāvinastu avasthāviśeṣā aṅkurakāraṇasya kāraṇāni iti nānekāntaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:30_0: (2.10) yadi te 'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti pratyekamiti /
SA15bsa071_u:30_2_0: nanu teṣu sahakāriṣu samarthasvabhāveṣu ko 'parasyopayogaḥ? na vai bhāvānāṃ kācit
SA15bsa071_u:30_2_1: prekṣāpūrvakāritā yataḥ ayamasmāsvanyatamo 'pi samarthaḥ kimasmābhiḥ kartavyam ityālocyāpare
SA15bsa071_u:30_4: tatprakṛteḥ / te samarthāḥ kiṃ nāparāparaṃ janayantīti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:30_5: na, tatraiva sāmarthyāt tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā nānyasyeti nāparāparajananam /
SA15bsa071_u:31_0: (2.11) bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhya ekakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāditi cet /
SA15bsa071_u:31_2_0: yathā mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrā dibhyo bhavato ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍādamṛtsvabhāvebhyo vṛkṣādibhyo
SA15bsa071_u:31_2_1: bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāttasyaiva mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthāviśeṣātmatayā tadanyebhyo
SA15bsa071_u:31_2_2: bhinnaḥ sūtrāttasyaiva mṛtsaṃsthāna viśeṣātmanaḥ cakrādervibhaktaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:31_4_0: na mṛdaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ / na ca tayoḥ śāktiviśeṣaviṣayabhede 'pi tajjanitaviśeṣabhedasya
SA15bsa071_u:32_0: (2.12) anyadeva saṃsthānaṃ guṇo mṛddravyāt tena bhinnasvabhāvaḥ kulālamṛtpiṇḍayorupayogaviśeṣa iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:32_1_0: uktamatra / api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ kulālaḥ kiṃ na pṛthakkaroti? guṇasya
SA15bsa071_u:32_1_1: dravyaparatantratvāt sa kathaṃ pṛthak kriyeta? tatsaṃsthānādhārātmakaṃ yadi svabhāvenaiva
SA15bsa071_u:32_5: anyathā mṛtpiṇḍasya svabhāvata eva tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatve vastuna eva prāgapi yogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi /
SA15bsa071_u:32_6: evaṃ tarthi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavatīti nānayoḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:32_7: bhedehi prāgvat prasajyeta / asti tāvadekasvabhāvatve 'pi ekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣateti kiṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ ekasvabhāvatvasādhanāya atinirbandhena /
SA15bsa071_u:33_0: (2.13) tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā naikopayogaviṣayāḥ kāryasyaikasvabhāvatve 'pi vastuta iti yatheha kāraṇabhedo bhinnaviśeṣopayogāt naikakāryaḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:33_2_2: 'pi vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhvantīti
SA15bsa071_u:33_3: ta evaite kāraṇaśaktibhedā yathāsvaṃ prativiśiṣṭakāryajanane 'vyavadheyaśaktitayā pratyupasthitāḥ kṣaṇikatvātsāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśrayaityucyante /
SA15bsa071_u:33_4: tathāhi tattebhyaḥ samastebhyaḥ upalambhātmakaṃ rūpagrahaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ viṣayarūpaṃ ceti prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvamekameva jātam /
SA15bsa071_u:34_0_1: parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ? na vai sarvatrātiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā kā tarhi? ekārthakaraṇaṃ
SA15bsa071_u:34_3: tasyaivāntyasya kāraṇatvāt / tatra ca kṣaṇe ekasya svabhāvasyāvivekād viśeṣasya kartumaśakyatvāt,
SA15bsa071_u:34_8: te samarthā eva svabhāvato 'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti,
SA15bsa071_u:35_1: svakāraṇebhyaḥ / tāni enamaparasannidhāna evaṃ kiṃ janayanti? kadācidanyathāpi syuḥ tataścaiko 'pi kvacit janayed iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:35_2: aparāpara pratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścitsāmyātsarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhitra evaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:36_0: tatra yo 'vyavadhanādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:36_1_0: yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samarthaḥ
SA15bsa071_u:36_1_1: teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścātra pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvbhāvino
SA15bsa071_u:36_2: tena yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādihetuḥ sa samarthasya heturiti tatra na kadācidanyathābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:37_0: (2.16) anena nyāyena sarvatra hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamo draṣṭavyaḥ pratikṣaṇamanyānyasvabhāvabhedānvayinīṣu śaktiṣu,
SA15bsa071_u:37_3: anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:37_4: kiṃ kevalasya kāryajanane 'samarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ? samartha iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:37_5: kiṃ na karoti? akurvan kathaṃ samarthaḥ? kuvindādayaḥ paṭādikriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvatra kurvantīti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:37_6: krīḍanaśīlo devānāṃ priyaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtamapi punaḥ punaḥ kārayati,
SA15bsa071_u:38_0: antyāvasthāyāṃ prāgasamarthasya sāmarthyotpattau tasya sāmarthyasya tatsvabhāvatve 'pūrvotpattirevasā /
SA15bsa071_u:38_1: atatsvabhāvatve saḥ akāraka eva sāmarthyākhyātpadārthāntarāt kāryotpattyabhyupagamāt /
SA15bsa071_u:39_0: (2.17) api ca yo 'sau sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu karoti sa tadaiva kasmāt karoti /
SA15bsa071_u:39_2: aho mahāsāmarthyaṃ mahāprabhāvasya darśanaṃ yasmādatatsvabhāvān api bhāvān svabhāvamātreṇa nānāprakāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte /
SA15bsa071_u:39_3: yadi nāma kiñcit kathañcidatrabhavato darśanaviṣayatām atikrāmet,
SA15bsa071_u:39_4: hanta aprasavadharmakamapetasantānaṃ syaditīyaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunoti /
SA15bsa071_u:40_0: na vai vayam atatsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānām asmaddarśanavaśāt kāryakriyāṃ brūmaḥ kintu svabhāvenaiva te kāryakāraṇadharmāḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:40_1: tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe te ete kārakasvabhāvā iti /
SA15bsa071_u:41_0: (2.18) satyam idamapyasti, svabhāvasteṣāṃ kāryakriyādharmā tena samastapratyayānāmakṛtvā kāryaṃ nopekṣāpattiriti /
SA15bsa071_u:41_1: so 'kṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadaivāntyāvasthāyāmutpanna āhosvit prāgapyāsīt? āsīt,
SA15bsa071_u:41_3: tatkimidānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca asti? ko vāsya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ- akṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ca na karotīti /
SA15bsa071_u:42_0: (2.19) sahitaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ na kevala iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:42_3: na hi sa sāhitye 'pi pararūpeṇa kartā syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:42_4: svarūpaṃ ca tasya prāgapi tadeveti kathaṃ kadacit kriyāvirāmaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:43_0: yasyāpi bhāvah kṣaṇikaḥ tasyāpi kasmāt kevalo na karoti? yadi bhavet kuryādeva /
SA15bsa071_u:43_2: uktaṃ yādṛśasya kriyā / sa kathamekakṣaṇabhāvī anyathā bhavet? yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ kārakākārakayoḥ svabhāvataddhetvorvirodhāt /
SA15bsa071_u:44_0: (2.20) yo 'pi manyate- akṣepakriyādharmaiva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:44_1: na sa sāhityamapekṣate, kāryaṃ tu pratyayāntarāpekṣamiti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti,
SA15bsa071_u:44_2: tasyāpi kathaṃ- sa bhāvaḥ kevalo 'pi karotyeva? kāryaṃ ca tasmātrotpadyate iti tadavastho virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:44_5: karotyeveti / kāryaṃ cāyaṃ kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ san paramapekṣamāṇaṃ kathamupekṣeta? paramanādṛtyaitat prasahya kuryāt /
SA15bsa071_u:44_6: evaṃ hi anenātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:44_7: kāryaṃ paramapekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattimasya kathayasi sa kevalo 'pi samarthasvabhāva iti tataḥ utpattiṃ brūṣe,
SA15bsa071_u:44_8: ete ca kathamevatraṃ syātām? tadayamīrṣyāśalyavitudyamānamarmā viklavaṃ vikrośatītyupekṣāmevārhati /
SA15bsa071_u:44_10: na tu akṣaṇikānāṃ yeṣāṃ pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati pṛthak kāryakaraṇasambhavena sahakāritvaniyamāyogāt /
SA15bsa071_u:45_0: (2.21) yatra tu santānopakāreṇa bhāvāḥ hetutāṃ pratipadyante,
SA15bsa071_u:45_2: tatra santānāśrayeṇa viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate na dravyāśrayeṇa,
SA15bsa071_u:45_4: nahi taṇḍulādīnāṃ viśeṣānutpattau dahanādibhāve 'pi odanajanma syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:45_5: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyeta tadā prāgivārthapratilpattiṃ naiva janayet /
SA15bsa071_u:46_0: akṣepakāriṣu indriyādiṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:46_1: tatra yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayairye yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante ityekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam /
SA15bsa071_u:47_0: (2.22) yatra tu viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ tatra hetusantānaḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāvāntarasya pratilambhaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:47_1: tatra svarasataḥ hetupratyayānāṃ pūrvopanipātakṣaṇānāṃ nivṛttau tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpattirevaṃ krameṇa yāvadatyantātiśayavato 'ntyakāraṇakalāpāt kāryotpattiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:48_2: tataśca parasparaviśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran /
SA15bsa071_u:49_1: evaṃ satyanavasthā syāt / na ca sahakāriṇaḥ parasparakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane nityaṃ yogyāvasthāḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:49_4: tenādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya notpadyata iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:49_5: nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne 'pi kaścidudvego bhavati yadyevamapi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:49_6: hanta tarhi ucyatām / na viśeṣotpādanāt sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ sambhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:50_0: (2.24) atha kathamekārthakriyāpi bhavet sāpi na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
SA15bsa071_u:50_1: atha bhavet, pṛthagapi sā bhavet / tathāca, tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlaṃ kāryamapi kevalāt syāditi cet /
SA15bsa071_u:50_2: atroktamuttaraṃ pratikṣaṇamaparāparaiḥ pratyayaiḥ yathā bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:50_4: teṣāṃ ca yata utpattiḥ, pratyekaṃ ca sāmarthye 'pi kevalānāmakriyā,
SA15bsa071_u:50_6: kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca sahakāribhiḥ akṣepakārindriyavijñānavacca kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāditi sarvamuktam /
SA15bsa071_u:51_0: (2.25) tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santānopakārāpekṣakāraṇakāryajanmani sahakāriṇāmādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakārikṛtaviśeṣajanmā na bhavati,
SA15bsa071_u:51_1: anantarakāryavat, tataḥ ye viśeṣā jāyante te tajjanmānaḥ tatprakṛtitvāditi nānavasthā /
SA15bsa071_u:51_3: karotu nāma, sa yadi akṣepakartṛdharmā, tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavātkevalo 'pi tathā syād ityuktam /
SA15bsa071_u:52_0: tasmādakṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānām ekārthakriyayā na kaścit sahakāritvaniyamaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:52_1: nāpi santatyopakāreṇeti na tasya kaścitsahakārīti kevalo 'pi kuryāt /
SA15bsa071_u:52_2: prāyastu saṃghātasthāyī bhāvasantānaḥ sahakāripratyayairupajanitaviśeṣaḥ svakāryaṃ kurvan dṛṣṭo bījādivat /
SA15bsa071_u:53_0: (2.26) tasmādyo yadātmā sa svasattāmātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati na bhūtvā tadbhāve parābhisaṃskāramapekṣata iti svabhāvato 'sthitidharmaṇo bhāvasya na kiñcitrāśakāraṇaiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:53_1: sthitidharmaṇo 'pi bhāvasya na nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit svabhāvānyathātvasya kenacit kartumaśakyatvāt /
SA15bsa071_u:53_2: tadanyathātvapratipattau sa tatsvabhāva eva na syāditi pūrva eva vikalpaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:54_0: yaśca parasmādanyathābhāvaḥ so 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ yaścāparaḥ sa kathaṃ tasya syāt? svabhāvabhedo hi vastubhedalakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa071_u:54_1: tathā ca yaḥ sthitidharmā jātaḥ na tasyānyathābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:54_2: etena kaṭhinādīnāṃ tāmrādīnām agnyādeḥ dravatvādisvabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pratyuktā /
SA15bsa071_u:54_3: tatrāpi pūrvakasya svarasanirodhitvādvināśe 'gnyāderupādānāccāpara eva dravādisvabhāvaḥ utpannaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:55_5: nedaṃ vikalpadvayamatikrāmati - kiṃ nityo bhāva utānityaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:55_6: prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityo bhavatīti ca bruvāṇo bhāvadvayaṃ cāha nityānityasvabhāvabhedam /
SA15bsa071_u:55_7: prāktanasya nityābhimatasya svabhāvasya svayaṃ nāśaṃ bruvāṇaḥ sarvadaiva nāśamanāśaṃ ca prāheti pūrvasmin vināśaheturasamartha eva /
SA15bsa071_u:56_1: kiṃ tarhi, paścādapi nitya eva, ekasvabhāvatvāt / sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśamanāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo nāma? tatsvabhāvavināśayoḥ aparaspararūpatvāt /
SA15bsa071_u:56_2: tasmāt satyasya vināśe vināśasvabhāvena tena bhavitavyaṃ,
SA15bsa071_u:56_4: tena svabhāvato naścare 'naśvare vā bhāve na vināśahetorupayogaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:57_0: (2.28) tasmādvināśaṃ pratyanapekṣo bhāvastadbhāvaniyataḥ iti yaḥ san sa vināśī naśvaratāyā nivṛttau sattvanivṛtirityanvayavyatirekasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:58_1: na hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na tatribandhanānvayavyatirekāsiddhiriti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:58_6: itthaṃ ca yat sattat kṣaṇikameveti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:59_4: tasmāt kāryaṃ svabhāvairyāvadbhiravinābhāvi kāraṇe teṣāṃ hetuḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:59_5: tatkāryatvaniyamāt / taireva ca dharmairye tairvinā na bhavanti /
SA15bsa071_u:59_7: na, tajjanyaviśeṣagrahaṇe 'bhimatatvāt liṅga viśeṣopādhīnāṃ ca sāmānyānām /
SA15bsa071_u:60_4: tatra yadi dhūmo 'gnyādisāmagjyā anyato 'pi bhavettadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti sakṛdapi tato na bhavet /
SA15bsa071_u:60_5: arthāntaravat / nāpi sāmagrī taṃ janayed atajjananasvabhāvatvāt /
SA15bsa071_u:60_6: sāmagjyantaravat / na ca dhūmasya tadatajjanyaḥ svabhāvo yuktaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:60_10: tasmādyo dhūmajananaḥ so 'gnyādisāmagrīviśeṣo yaḥ agnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa janitaḥ sa eva dhūmo bhavatīti kāryakāraṇayorevaṃ svabhāvasya niyamāt tadvijātīyādutpattirna bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:61_0: tadyādṛśaṃ kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇād dṛṣṭamekadā tattanna vyabhicarati /
SA15bsa071_u:61_1: tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptiḥ siddhā bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:62_0: (3.3) nanu vijātīyādapi kiñcid bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tadyathā go mayādeḥ śālūkādiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:62_1: na vijātīyādutpattiḥ / tathāvidhameva hi tādṛśāmādinimittamiti na kāraṇabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:62_4: na hi ākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ tattve nimittam,
SA15bsa071_u:62_6: anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagrayā avilakṣaṇakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedābhedābhyāṃ kāryabhedābhedāvityahetukau viśvasya bhedābhedau syātām /
SA15bsa071_u:62_7: tathā hi na bhedādbheda iti abhedādapi nābhedaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:62_8: tadvyatiriktaśca na kaścidbhāvasvabhāva ityahetukatvādbhāvānāṃ nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:62_12: nāparaṃ, tasyaiva tatra śakteḥ, anyasya cāśakteḥ tayostajjananetarasvabhāvatvena bhedāt /
SA15bsa071_u:62_13: tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇādapi tasyotpattau na tajjananaśaktipratiniyama iti yat kiñcit yataḥ kutaścitsyāt /
SA15bsa071_u:62_14: tajjananaśaktisāmye tu tadeveti na kāryaṃ duṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati /
SA15bsa071_u:63_5: yogyatāyā bhāvasvarūpatvāt / tasmādanya upalambhajananayogya evānupalabdhiḥ pūrvavat /
SA15bsa071_u:63_6: yatra yasmitrupalabhyamāne niyamena yasyopalabdhiḥ bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt satatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ ekajñānasaṃsargāt /
SA15bsa071_u:64_0: sa kevalastadapekṣayā tadanyaśceducyate tadā tajjñānaṃ tatsvabhāvo vā jñātṛjñeya dharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:65_1: uktamatra yathā paryudāsavṛttyāpekṣātaḥ tadvivikto 'rthastajjñānaṃ vābhāvo 'nupalabdhiścocyata iti /
SA15bsa071_u:66_0: (4.3) sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhistadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam? kiṃ punarabhāvasya siddhireva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ? iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:67_0: anyabhāvastāvatra sādhanam / yatsiddhau yasya na siddhistattasya liṅgaṃ bhavati dhūmāgnivat /
SA15bsa071_u:68_0: (4.4) sambandhābhāvācca tacca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt,
SA15bsa071_u:68_2: yathā kṛtakatvasyānityatvena ekārthasamavāyo dhūmasya vā liṅginaikārthasamavāyaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:68_4: naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandhaḥ yenāsyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:68_6: śabdārthayoḥ tatpratipādanābhiprāye sati tatprayogāt kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvalakṣaṇo vā sambandhaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:68_7: ayaṃ cātra na sambhavati yataḥ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:68_8: siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tanmukhena viṣayaviṣabhibhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:68_9: sa eva cāsati sambandhe na sidhyati /
SA15bsa071_u:69_1: tathā ca ghaṭābhāvastadanyabhāvāt iti ghaṭasya sarvatra sarvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa071_u:69_2: na, pradeśādirdharmī ghaṭābhāvena viśeṣyata iti tadviśeṣaṇabhūto 'bhāvaḥ sādhyate na tu kevalaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:69_6: na, pradeśāderevānyabhāvatvāt / yatraiva hi pradeśādau yatrāstīti ucyate sa eva tenāsaṃsṛṣṭo 'nyabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:69_7: taddarśanādevāsya ghaṭo nāsti iti vikalpo bhavati iti kathaṃ tasyaiva liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:70_0: (4.6) na cātra sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanā sambhavati yena sāmānyaṃ heturbhaved viśeṣo dharmāti,
SA15bsa071_u:70_3: na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃ tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:70_4: tādṛśe kevale pradeśe sarvatrābhāva iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:70_6: sa ca tatpratipattāveva siddha iti kasya idānīṃ talliṅgam? anvayasyānugamanamapi nirarthakam /
SA15bsa071_u:71_0: (4.7) asti virodhaḥ sambandhaḥ tato 'nyabhāvādabhāvasya siddhiḥ iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:71_1_0: kena kasya virodho 'nyabhāvena pratiyoginaḥ kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātumiṣṭo yena
SA15bsa071_u:71_1_1: liṅgaliṅganorvirodhaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt? abhāvastupratiyogino ghaṭasya anyabhāvena
SA15bsa071_u:71_2: tasmin prameye liṅgaliṅginoḥ kathaṃ virodhaḥ? tasmātsambandhābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:72_0: (4.8) nanu anyabhāvatadabhāvayorasati sambandhe 'nyabhāvagatyāpi tadabhāvagatirna syāditi cet /
SA15bsa071_u:72_1: na vai kutaścit sambandhādanyabhāvastadabhāvagamaka iṣṭaḥ kintu anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo yathoktaṃ prāk /
SA15bsa071_u:72_2: tasyānyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya kevalasyaikātmavyasthitasya tadātmanā pariccedasyaivānyavyavaccedatvāt tasya kaivalyamevāparasya vaikalyamiti tadanyabhāva eva tadabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:72_4: anyathā tasya pariccedena tato 'nyasya avyavaccede tatparicceda eva na syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:72_5: tadatadrūpayoravivekāt / ya eva vyavahāraḥ kasyacitkvaceddeśe darśanāt prāptiparihārārthaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:72_6: na hyayamanalaṃ paśyatrapi kevalam analameva paśyatīti kathaṃ salilārthī tatra na praverteta? anupalambhena salilābhāvaḥ pratīyata iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:72_7_0: ko 'yamanupalambho nāma? yadi salilopalambhābhāvaḥ tadā kathamabhāvaḥ kasyacitpratipattiḥ
SA15bsa071_u:72_7_1: pratipattiheturvā? tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? tasya tato vānyasya kasyacidapyapratipattāvapi
SA15bsa071_u:72_8: tasmādayamanalaṃ paśyatrapi analo 'yaṃ salilam iti nādhyavasyatīti na tiṣṭhetrāpi pratiṣṭheta /
SA15bsa071_u:73_0: (4.9) tata evaikasya darśanād anyābhāvagatiścet kathamekaṃ dṛṣṭamanyatrāstīti pratyāyayati? tasyaiva kevalasya darśanād iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:73_1: idamevāsmābhiḥ prāgabhihitaṃ kasmāttavātra paruṣamivābhāti? tasmāttīrādarśineva śakuninā dūraparyaṭayāpi pratyāgantavyamityalam avidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ pratipattyā /
SA15bsa071_u:74_0: (4.10) yadyekapariccedādevānyavyavaccedaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvasyānyasya aviśeṣeṇa tatrābhāvasiddhirbhavet /
SA15bsa071_u:75_0: (4.11) ekātmapariccedāt tasya tadanyātmavyavaccedo bhavati tadātmaniyatapratibhāsajñānāt na hi tadātmā tadanyasyātmā bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:75_1: anyātmāvyavaccede pravṛttinivṛttyoḥ abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:75_2: taṃ ca deśakālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadātmanopalabhamānā buddhiḥ tathātvapracyutimasya vyavaccinati /
SA15bsa071_u:75_4: yadi anyathābhāvo vyavaccinno bhavatiḥ tathātvaṃ ca tasyaiva bhavati nānyasyeti anyathābhūtāttathābhūtaṃ vyavaccindatyeva tat pariccinati /
SA15bsa071_u:75_8: tasya tadanyatayā vyāptyabhāve tena tadarthāvyavaccedātpunarapi bhāvasyāpariccedaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa071_u:76_1: tadanyad vyavaccināti, tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ ca sūcayati iti ekapramāṇavyāpāra eṣaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:76_2: tathāhi kvacitpramāṇaṃ pravṛtaṃ tadeva tadanyasmād vyavaccinattī,
SA15bsa071_u:76_3: tasyaiva pariccedāt / tadanyadeva ca tasmād vyavaccinatti anyasya tatra apariccedāt /
SA15bsa071_u:79_0: (4.13) anyabhāvaviṣayasyopalabdhirapi tadabhāvasya sādhikeṣṭaiva na tu liṅgatvena /
SA15bsa071_u:79_3: na hi anyasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya tatpratipatteḥ anvayavyatirekau prasādhya tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
SA15bsa071_u:79_4: kiṃ tarhi? tadanyaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
SA15bsa071_u:79_5: darśanānantaram idamasti idaṃ tu nāsti iti vyavasthāpanāt /
SA15bsa071_u:79_6: tacca tasya liṅgaṃ bhavati yasyānvayi vyatireko ca /
SA15bsa071_u:79_7: dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ / na hi evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anyabhāvopalabdhistatra tadabhāvaḥ iti /
SA15bsa071_u:79_10: kiṃtu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya sādhiketi anavasthā dṛṣṭāntānāmityapratipattiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:79_12: so 'nyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇenānupalambhena siddhaḥ san mūḍhapratipattāvabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayed iti alaṃ prasaṅgena /
SA15bsa071_u:80_3: sa tathā siddhaḥ san kāryavyāpyayorabhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati /
SA15bsa071_u:80_4: svabhāvānupalabdhau tu anupalabdhyā liṅgabhūtayā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate /
SA15bsa071_u:81_0: (4.15) yadi kāraṇavyāpakau tadanyabhāvasiddhayānupalabdhyā siddhāsad vyavahārāvanyasyābhāvamabhāvavyavahāṃra ca sādhayataḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:81_1: sā ca tayorupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāvevāsadvyavahārasya sādhiketi kathaṃ tayoḥ parokṣe 'rtheprayogaḥ? naiva prayogaḥ pramāṇatayā,
SA15bsa071_u:81_2: liṇgasyāniścayāt / kevalaṃ kāraṇavyāpakayorhi siddhasambandhayoryadyabhāvaḥ parasyāpi avaśyamabhāvaḥ iti etasya darśanārthamete prayujyete iti /
SA15bsa071_u:81_3: eṣa eva pakṣadharmo 'nvayavyatirekavān iti tadaṃśena vyāptaḥ trilakṣaṇa eva trividha eva heturgamakaḥ svaśādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt /
SA15bsa071_u:82_0: (5.1) ṣaḍliṅgo heturityapare / trīṇi caitāni abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ jñātatvaṃ ceti /
SA15bsa071_u:82_1: tatrābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15bsa071_u:82_2: bādhāvinābhāvayorvirodhāt / avinābhāvo hi satyeva sādhyadharme bhāvo hetoḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:82_3_0: sa hetustallakṣaṇaḥ dharmiṇi syād atra ca sādhyadharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet? pratyakṣānumāne
SA15bsa071_u:82_3_1: hi sādhyadharmaṃ bādhamāne taṃ dharmiṇo niṣkāsayataḥ tasmiṃśca satyeva heturbhavan
SA15bsa071_u:83_0: anyatra sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī heturna punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇeveti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:83_1: tat kimayaṃ tapasvī śaṇḍhamudvāhya putraṃ mṛgayate? yasya dharmiṇyasatyapi sādhyadharme bhāvaḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:84_0: (5.2) ata eva bādhābhāva uktaḥ / syādetad, yata eva heturanyathāpi bhavedata eva pramāṇābhyāmabādhitadharmā dharmītyucyata iti /
SA15bsa071_u:85_0: tatkimidānīṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyam? abādhayaiva sādhyasiddhervyartho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:85_1: bādhāyāmapi sādhyābhāvasya tena sādhanāt kutaḥ sādhanasya sāmarthyam /
SA15bsa071_u:85_3: bādhakapramāṇasyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāvasya ca saṃbhavaḥ syāditi na sāmarthyamabādhāyāḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:86_0: (5.3) na bādhāyā abhāvo 'bādhā / kiṃ tarhi? bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādhāyāḥ saṃbhave 'pi syāditi sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:86_1_0: kiṃ nu vai heturbādhopalabdherbibheti na punarbādhāyā yena bādhāmanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau
SA15bsa071_u:86_1_1: prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ? sa tarhi paramārthena- 'bādhā kimasti nāsti' ityanapekṣya bādhāyā
SA15bsa071_u:86_2: sa kiṃ kvacit satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayed yenāsyā abhāvaniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuśca pratyujyate /
SA15bsa071_u:86_3: evaṃ ca sati abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:86_6: yathā ca bādhānupalabdhau tāmabhyupagamya prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāvapi prayujyatām,
SA15bsa071_u:87_0: (5.4) na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyamiti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:88_2: yato hetorbādhāsambhavakṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhavet? atha tannivṛttau bādhā nivartate /
SA15bsa071_u:88_5: upalambhasya nivṛttāvapi bādhāyā anivṛttau tadavasthaṃ hetorasāmarthyamityaprayogaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:88_6: tasmāt svasādhyabhāvābhāvādhyāmanyathāpi bhavanhetuḥ dharmiṇi na kiñcidbhāvayati na vibhāvayati iti tadupakṣepo na samarthaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:89_0: (5.5) tatrāma tasmād viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ bhavet lakṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati yasya bhāve 'pi yasya aparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:89_1: tadyathā pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti /
SA15bsa071_u:89_2: n acaitad abādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati iti na sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvinorhetuviruddhayorviṣaye bādhā saṃbhavati iti na tadabhāvaḥ pṛthaganayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:89_3: tasmād hetoḥ prayoge pratijñādoṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavo nāsti /
SA15bsa071_u:91_0_0: katham? eko hi hetuḥ svasādhyabhāva eva bhavediti tatrāvyabhicārī tatraiva tasmādanyo
SA15bsa071_u:91_0_1: 'pi kathaṃ heturbhavati? ekasya yat sādhyaṃ tadabādhakasya dharmasya bhāva eva bhāvāditi
SA15bsa071_u:92_0: (5.7) api ca / kiṃ yo vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetuḥ sa samyagjñānasya viparyayasya vā heturiṣṭa āhosvidapradarśitapratihetuḥ? kiṃ cātaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:93_1: na hi aniścitātmanaḥ pratipādakadharmasya tallakṣaṇatvaṃ yathā sandigdhasya pakṣadharmatvasya /
SA15bsa071_u:93_2: nāpi sandigdhalakṣaṇo heturbhavediti na kaścid heturbhavet /
SA15bsa071_u:93_3: tulye lakṣaṇe di dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ saṃbhavo 'dṛṣṭapratiyogiṣu api śaṃkāmutpādayati viśeṣābhāvāt /
SA15bsa071_u:93_4: sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa071_u:93_5: yatastadviśeṣād heturekāntena nirastapratipakṣaḥ svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti atallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt tathā ca vyarthā ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā /
SA15bsa071_u:93_6: ato viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇaṃ hīyeta svalakṣaṇayuktayorhetvorekatra dharmiṇi virodhenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārī iti /
SA15bsa071_u:94_0: (5.8) na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ,
SA15bsa071_u:94_2: tasmātrāstyevaṃ viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā bhavitavyam /
SA15bsa071_u:95_0: dṛṣṭapratihetorapi hetoḥ prāgitareṇa na kaścidviśeṣo lakṣyate /
SA15bsa071_u:96_1: “yadā tarhi śabdatvaṃ nityamabhyupagaccati tadāyaṃ hetureva syād yadyatra anityatvahetuṃ kṛtakatvādi kaścitra darśayed “ iti /
SA15bsa071_u:96_3_0: nyāyamanupālayadbhirasaṃvaraṇīyamiti kaṣṭataraṃ vyasanaṃ kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta?
SA15bsa071_u:96_3_1: sa tāvadayaṃ hetuḥ vastūni svasādhyaprakṛtīni kṛtvā tatpramāṇakān puruṣān abhyudayaniḥ
SA15bsa071_u:96_3_2: śreyasābhyāṃ yojayitvā punaśca pratibhāvatā puruṣeṇa hetvantaranidarśanena utkīlitasādhanasāmarthyaḥ
SA15bsa071_u:96_3_3: tāni vastūni tadbhāvasampadastāṃśca puruṣān abhyudayaniḥ śreyasasampadaḥ pracyāvya
SA15bsa071_u:96_3_4: bhraṣṭarājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gaccatīti kimatra brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:97_0: (5.10) puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ hi yadi sādhanatvaṃ syāt tadā na kiñcit sādhanamasādhanaṃ vā /
SA15bsa071_u:97_1: sa ca heturyadi svabhāvatastaddharmabhāvī tadā kathamanyathā kriyeta? vastusvabhāvānyathābhāvasyābhāvāt /
SA15bsa071_u:98_0: (5.11) jñānaṃ punarna liṅgasyātmarūpamiti kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA15bsa071_u:98_1_1: yasya darśanād ayaṃ pravibhāgena sādhanaṃ vyavasthāpya tasyeṣṭārthasaṃnidhānasaṃpratyayāt
SA15bsa071_u:98_2: tathā yadasyātmarūpaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ na tu pararūpam /
SA15bsa071_u:98_3: pratipattijanmani upayogamātrāt tallakṣaṇatve prameyapuruṣādīnāmapi tallakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa071_u:98_4: na hi teṣvapi asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:99_1: na, tasyānyārthatvāt / sapakṣavipakṣayordarśanādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetumiccatāṃ naiva samartho heturbhavati satorapi darśanādarśanayoragamakatvadarśanāt /
SA15bsa071_u:99_2: tena bhāvābhāvābhyāmeva gamako heturiti jñāpanārtha niścitagrahaṇam /
SA15bsa071_u:99_3: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15bsa071_u:100_2_1: tatsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākarṣatiḥ parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasyaḥ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ
SA15bsa071_u:100_2_2: saṃvādakamiti tadrūpamapratipattṛṇāṃ tataḥ pravṛttirna bhavatīti paropalakṣaṇātvādeva
SA15bsa071_u:100_2_3: pravartake jñānaṃ siddhamḥ tathāpi tāveva viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvau kecid darśanādarśanamātreṇa
SA15bsa071_u:100_4: tasmāt pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva bhāvābhāvau sidhyata iti vipratipattinirāsārthamasmābhirniścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15bsa071_u:102_3: ekaṃ vākyamubhayaṃ gamayatītyucyate naiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyeti /
SA15bsa071_u:102_4: nanu tatraiva bhāva ityatra tadarthatayā tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate,
SA15bsa071_u:102_5: atadbhāve 'vaśyamabhāva ityatra ca tadbhāve bhāva iti parasparākṣepa iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:103_0: (5.15) tasmāt tatraiva bhāva iti na bhāva evocyate itareṇāpi nā bhāva eva yena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā dvitīyamākṣipet /
SA15bsa071_u:103_1: naivaṃ jñānaṃ, paropalakṣaṇaśāstrāgṛhītajñānāt trailakṣaṇyādavyatirekāditi na lakṣaṇāntaram /
